attributes.long-description:
The top-ten selling game and its three expansions are now available in one all-inclusive package: introducing Magic: The Gathering® - Duels of the Planeswalkers® 2011 Gold.

Unleash an arsenal of deadly creatures and devastating spells as you battle across the Multiverse. And once you’ve mastered the base game, prepare yourself for even more intense boss battles spread over three incredible expansions.

In expansion 1, challenge the mighty elder dragon Nicol Bolas. Prevail and you’ll be able to unlock decks crafted by Sarkhan Vol and Jace Beleren!

Dare to duel the ancient vampire Sorin Markov in expansion 2, and unlock Nicol Bolas’s “Eons of Evil” deck!

Expansion 3 features three new opponents, including the very dangerous Sarkhan the Mad, in addition to unlockable decks from Gideon Jura and Niv-Mizzet!

And all three expansions come packed with a host of additional features, including new cards, achievements, co-op levels and much more!

Download now—the duels await!

Wizards of the Coast, Magic: The Gathering, Duels of the Planeswalkers, and their respective logos are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast LLC in the U.S.A. and other countries. Other trademarks are property of their respective owners. ©2010 Wizards of the Coast LLC.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
